title: Drawing, "Battle scene"
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: One of a three part drawing.  Drawing of a battle with soldiers on horse and foot.  Central paper is 1901-39-2065.  At left us a soldier mounted on a horse looking left.  At right are two soldiers on foot bother looking at the mounted rider, one with his back turned.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Battle scene".
Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2065.
